panels.description: Total number of reconciliations per controller
panels.title: Total Reconciliation Count Per Controller

panels.description: Total number of reconciliation errors per controller
panels.title: Reconciliation Error Count Per Controller

panels.description: How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested
panels.title: Seconds For Items Stay In Queue (before being requested) (P50, P90, P99)

panels.description:
How many seconds of work has done that is in progress and hasn't been observed by work_duration.
Large values indicate stuck threads.
One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases.
panels.title: Unfinished Seconds

panels.description: How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes.
panels.title: Seconds Processing Items From WorkQueue (P50, P90, P99)

panels.description: Total number of retries handled by workqueue
panels.title: Work Queue Retries Rate

panels.description: This query shows the amount of physical memory (RAM) used by the process.
panels.title: Process memory

panels.description: This query shows the rate of change in physical memory (RAM) usage by the process over a specified time interval.
panels.title: Process memory deriv
